concept.title: JavaScript Evaluator
concept.shortdesc: The JavaScript Evaluator processes data based on custom JavaScript. Use the JavaScript processor to use JavaScript code to perform custom processing.

conbody.p: JavaScript EvaluatoroverviewprocessorsJavaScript EvaluatorThe JavaScript Evaluator can process data one record at a time or one batch at a time.
When you use a JavaScript Evaluator in a pipeline, the passes a batch of data to the processor and converts the data to an expected format for processing.

The JavaScript Evaluator supports the following versions of Java:
Java 7 - Supports ECMAScript 5 and partial support for JavaScript 1.8. Runs on the Rhino 1.7R3 JavaScript engine.
Java 8 - Supports ECMAScript 5.1. Runs on the Nashorn JavaScript engine.
